dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker's facial expression appears neutral while discussing a potentially exciting topic.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Work on aligning facial expressions with the excitement of the topic.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses 'this' without pointing to anything specific.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Use hand gestures to emphasize key points.

dissonanceFlags.description: Long pause followed by rapid speech.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Practice maintaining a consistent speaking pace.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker uses filler words such as 'um' and 'uh' which can disrupt the flow.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Consider reducing filler words to improve clarity.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker is observed touching his hair and shifting his weight.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Try to minimize nervous movements to appear more confident.

dissonanceFlags.description: The speaker's hands remain mostly still during explanations.
dissonanceFlags.coaching: Use gestures more frequently to engage the audience.

priorities: Match facial expressions to your words

geminiReport.coachingAdvice:
The presentation demonstrated composed body language, indicating a confident and steady presence. Eye contact was generally effective, establishing a connection with the audience.
